meanings.definition: The quality of being able to be played.
meanings.sent1: The playabilities of the new toy were evident as children happily interacted with it.
meanings.sent2: Children's toys are designed with playabilities in mind to ensure they are engaging and fun.
meanings.sent3: The playabilities of the board game made it a hit at the family gathering.
meanings.sent4: Her storytelling had a unique playabilities that captivated the audience.
meanings.sent5: The playabilities of the playground equipment made it a favorite spot for kids to have fun.

meanings.definition: The ability to engage in play.
meanings.sent1: His playabilities were evident as he joined the other kids in the game.
meanings.sent2: Children develop their social skills through their playabilities with peers.
meanings.sent3: The puppy's playabilities brought joy to the whole family.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity and playabilities shone during the drama class.
meanings.sent5: The playabilities of the park attracted families looking for a place to relax and have fun.

meanings.definition: The potential for enjoyment or entertainment through play.
meanings.sent1: The playabilities of the video game kept players entertained for hours.
meanings.sent2: Outdoor activities offer great playabilities for families to bond and have fun together.
meanings.sent3: The playabilities of the comedy show had the audience laughing non-stop.
meanings.sent4: Her playabilities in organizing events made every gathering a memorable experience.
meanings.sent5: The playabilities of the music concert created a lively and enjoyable atmosphere for all attendees.
